ABOUT
US

TANDANG SANGAR IS A DIGITAL COLLECTIVE DEDICATED TO THE RAW, THE UNPOLISHED, AND THE LOUD.

Founded in 2026, we operate from the shadows of Surakarta. We believe that culture is not created in boardrooms, but in basements, street corners, and makeshift studios.

We are anti-algorithm. We curate based on gut feeling, not engagement metrics. If it's real, we document it.

OUR MANIFESTO

  • 01 NO FILTERS. Reality is grainy.
  • 02 NO INFLUENCERS. Real people only.
  • 03 NO COMPROMISE. Loud or nothing.
  • 04 ALWAYS LOCAL. Support your scene.

THE TEAM CORE MEMBERS

RIZKY 'HAMMER'

EDITOR IN CHIEF

Vinyl addict and noise connoisseur. Menulis untuk hidup, hidup untuk gigs.

SARASVATI

VISUAL DIRECTOR

Shoots exclusively on expired film. Menangkap momen sebelum hilang ditelan jaman.

AI_ARCHITECT

HEAD OF TECH

Living in the terminal. Memastikan website ini tetap brutal dan on-air.

TANDANG
SANGAR

A collective of noise makers, visual agitators, and taste testers. We document the culture others ignore.
